review: I visited Dr simran kataria for root canal treatment. one of my friend recommended her . she was very professional and it was pain-free treatment. I highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently had the pleasure of entrusting my son's dental health to Dr. Simran, and I couldn't be more impressed with the level of care and expertise she provided. My son had a tooth decay issue, and Dr. Simran performed a pulpotomy with unparalleled skill.Dr. Simran's approach to her young patients is truly commendable. She handles them delicately, creating a comfortable environment that alleviates any anxiety. What sets her apart is her commitment to thorough communication. Dr. Simran took the time to explain every step of the pulpotomy process, ensuring that both my son and I fully understood the procedure.One of the standout qualities of Dr. Simran is her responsiveness. Whenever I had questions or concerns, she was just a phone call away. This level of accessibility not only reassured me but also highlighted her dedication to her patients' well-being.I highly recommend Dr. Simran for pediatric dentistry. Her exceptional skills, compassionate approach, and effective communication make her a standout professional in her field. My son's positive experience under her care is a testament to Dr. Simran's commitment to providing top-notch dental care for children.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was suffering from dental issues from quite some time but I was reluctant in visiting any dentist, one of my frn suggested dr simran for my treatment and I only went for check up  just to check if I can get myself treated here, dr simran not only made me conformable, she also answered all my questions with such calmness that I can not tell. It's been two months since my treatment and it is no less then perfection. I would recommend her and her team. You are in safe hand if you visit this place as far as dental implants are concerned.
reply_text: Thank You for your appreciation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had a very pleasant experience with Dr. Simran and her staff. My daughter was very anxious about the appointment and the procedure but Dr. Simran was very patient with her and spent a lot of time trying to calm her down, her staff was very helpful and kind and always available to help. Dr. Simran is very professional and takes time to explain what Needs to be done and provides valuable advice. It is not easy to find a good doctor for your kid, I highly recommend Dr. Simran for kids and adults.

tags: Value for money,Wait time,
review: Costly, very  costly!!! We went to Dr after seeing some gr8 reviews about being affordable *** **** ********* *** ***** ********* *** ****** ***** she kept telling us my 8 yr old son teeths were indeed quite clean. Just need a small session of scaling that too for front tooths only. As no discussion was done from Dr end about extra charges(which is usually done whenever seperate session is required) we though it would be included in consultation charges only. But to our shock after session has ended she asked for  2000 bucks for scaling and 300 consultation. We were like r u serious??? *** ********* **** *** **** **** ** **** ********* ************ **** *** *** ****** *** **** ******* *******Will suggest everyone to once talk directly about their charges( which we prefer doc or theire compundar should do themselves before hand) before visiting here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had a very great experience with Dr. Simran and she handled the case of my 4 yrs old daughter extremely well. After having bad experiences with renowned Dentists of Gurgaon and wandering for almost 6 months, we finally landed at Esthetica Internation Clinic. Before approaching Dr.Simran we were told by so-called dental experts to have Pulpectomy for my daughter, however, when we consulted Dr. Simran, we were explained every possible detail. Apart from that,  the clinic maintaines a high degree of hygiene standards and heavily equipped too. Kudos to Dr. Simran.  Definitely, I can say that we have finally got a Dentist for life, who really cares for her patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an accident I was badly injured ad  my 3 teeth were badly injured. Everyone told me to choose best doctor for dental treatment as it's very delicate ad u can't trust just like that. But one of our close friend told  me about esthetica international . I went there and the staff was very polite and very quick. DR Simran kataria was my doctor she attended me asap as it was really emergency She explained me about My 3 teeth which were badly injured 2 were half broken and one Was fractured. Dr simran  explained me each and every step of my treatment. And she is my saviour . I got root canals and crown done, the entire process was completely painless. when I was confused about which crown to choose  she helped me to choose best thing which will last long. she and her staff always very polite and helpful . she answered my each and every question very politly. I m So happy that i am smiling just because of DR Simran kataria .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited Dr Simran for my 5 year old daughter for multiple dental treatments and she was the 5th dentist we visited. "No words", the finest dentist we have ever experienced. The kind of behavioural treatment, patience with my daughter who asked multiple questions about instruments in every visit, and finally treatment was such excellent, painless and fearless. As a mother, it was very upsetting and tense thoughts while taking her to the dentist but Dr. Simran, simply treated Saesha like her own child. Thank you so much Dr once again.  I am very very relaxed, treatment is completed today at such happy notes. 🤗😊
reply_text: Thank you for sharing your experience. I’m glad we could make your experience worthwhile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. S Simran kataria  is an excellent dentist and a thorough professional. She has a remarkable ability to inspire confidence in her patients because of her thorough and methodical approach. She is very detailed and transparent in explaining the problems as also their resolution. My father (76 years) and my son (8 years) have both been under Dr. Simran's care. My father has been fully satisfied and very happy with his results while my son simply loves his dentist appointments because in his words "the dentist is super cool because she explains everything to me". Dr. Simran has a very good team of experts and assistants. The Clinic is very well managed and is exceptionally clean and hygienic which is commendable. It has modern equipment and devices. Esthetica is a great place to go for your dental care and health.

review:
I went for my daughter who is 5 years old. She had a toothache for last 5 days. I went to some other doc. First, she told me that u have to go for Root canal treatment (RCT) for my 5 year old daughter n charging 5k for 1 tooth. I got very scared. But this sweet doc tell me that only new teeth is coming. That’s y she is feeling pain nothing much. N give only 1 syrup that’s all. 

Ohh... I feel so relaxed. 

I  recommend Doc Simran
